text: @senrobportman @realDonaldTrump Proactive? A month since the world learned of the coronavirus. The trump administration sent uninformed & unequipped workers to handle those know to have the disease. (cruise ship.)One of those workers flew as a regular passenger on a later flight. Is trump trying to kill us?

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
